title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 457 - Snowmobile Accident Reports
content:

State Regulations
§ 457.1 - Accident reporting
§ 457.2 - Police reporting
§ 457.3 to 457.7 - Repealed
§ 457.10 to 457.11 - Repealed
§ 457.12 to 457.26 - Repealed

Payment of State Aid to Municipalities Enforcing Snowmobile Provisions (§ 457.30 to 457.33)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 457

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §§3.09[8], 25.25, 27.15, title
D
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
